modName: CM Matching Orish Shield High-Res Mod
summary: The Orc shield doesn\'t match the rest of the Orc armor.  This mod changes the color of the high resolution textures to match the Orc armor set.
descriptionHtml:
The Orc shield doesn\'t match the rest of the Orc armor.  This mod changes the color of the high resolution textures to match the Orc armor set.  The intent of this mod was to provide a completely new mod.  A search of the Nexus did not find the Orc sheild updated for the High Resolution Texture pack. There are three that change the low resolution textures, but none for the high resolution textures. This oversight is now corrected with this mod.     


Recommended Mods
================

- Live Another Life - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=9557



Installation Requirements for Version 1.0
=========================================

Official Skyrim patch 1.5 or greater.

Download and install using one of the following methods.  


Installation - Nexus Mod Manager
================================

Use the \"Download with Manager\" button on this webpage and activate after download. 


Installation - Manual
=====================

Drop the graphics folders into your Data folder.


Uninstall
=========

If you used a mod management program, use it to uninstall. Otherwise delete the graphics folder from the Data folder.  


Load Order
==========

Load order will not make any difference.


Incompatible Mods
=================

None at this time.
author: Cutthroat Mods
